title: 14 day ban because of one game
body: okay so it was my first game of the night and i was trying out to be more aggressive with nami didnt do so well and ended up just getting hooked all the time by blitz, in the end i went 1/11/2 with nami but still did more damage than our jung and adc more damage then there mid and jung, im not a flamer or feeder in games im an Honorable player who trys and up hold the code at all game, i legit just had one bad game and got given a 14 day ban of the bat.

replies.body:
So there are two main categories of behaviour that will get you an instant 14-day ban. These are no tolerance language (hate speech, suicide encouragement, etc.) and gameplay toxicity (feeding, griefing, etc.).

Your reform card will shed light on which of these behaviours specifically you were punished for.

If you feel a punishment has been made in error, you can appeal it via player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If you want community feedback on a punishment, then you can post your reform card (the popup telling you are banned when you log into the game).
